Free parking, 1.00 washers, 1.25 dryers, 10.00 showers (clean). Dunkin Donuts on site, cafe across the street but opens and closes early. Right down the street is a market and other retail and food chains. For all you health conscious drivers, Planet Fitness is 3 miles away. Perfect location and an awesome truck stop.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great food, great service. I could definitely tell that it is a local favorite. There was even a shower that I would use if I needed a shower. Plenty of parking.  This was definitely a beacon of light after delivering to C & S.
Very convenient off i91 exit 35. Not a lot of parking spaces for trucks, it also has a dinner with good food and a free shower for truck drivers.

Stayed here for about 24 hours and the experience was better than I expected! Plenty of parking and there are 2 showers. One in the women restroom and 1 in the men’s restroom. Shower and restroom was clean. There is a small convenient store …

… open 24hrs, fuel available 24hrs. Food is hot and good and you can get a free hot shower and undisturbed quite rest without having to pay for parking and everyone was friendly and polite so I will definitely stop here anytime I pass through

Waitresses and food are great. Decent lot for parking, but not huge. Fuel cost 2.859, Dec 6 2019. I like the place, never too busy. The locals like the cafe, so it's a little busy. 1 shower off the bathroom, semi private, 6 bucks?

… for a truck driver! It’s a little older but gets the job done! Got a good hot shower, a nice hot meal and some good cheap fuel with my TCS fuel card paid 4.334/gal! Oh and the employees were very nice and welcoming, Jenni took my order and …

Plenty enough truck parking. Old-school diner great food!! compliments to the chef and to my waitress. They do have 1 shower and very clean...awesome place to park for the night eat some good food and get a clean shower...

This is a diner with a separate convenience store and diesel pumps. The food is great. And yes, they do have a shower. It was four bucks, and you need your own towels.
